name: GetIntegrationsByBearerToken
description:
__Activity name:__ GetIntegrationsByBearerToken
    

List of all the integrations for the logon user

Authorization.description: A valid Bearer token for authorizing the request.

Accept.description: The accept header is used to influence what type of output is returned and in most cases the version of the output

$ul: **version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**_embedded**
**application**
**id**: The unique identifier of an object (GUID/UUID)
**isBlocked**: Indicates whether the application as a whole is blocked (for all users)
**logo**: An URI to the logo of the client
**name**
**createdOn**: The time the integration was succesfully initiated
**isBlocked**: Indicates whether the application user combination is blocked (for this single user)
**lastLogin**: The time the integration was last active

$block: data to be used for paging

$ul: **currentPage**: Current page returned in the response
**pageSize**: Number of records in the response
**totalPages**: Number of pages available
**totalSize**: Total number of records, taking into account the given filter.
**version**
**obsoleteDate**: The date (can be null) on which the `resourceVersion` is no longer supported/available
**resourceVersion**: The resource version of the object in the response
**messages**
**_embedded**
**message**
